title: Loving my "My Shop" discounts.
body: I main Darius and when I got Blue Darius as a discount I was happy, I already own Green and Toxic Darius. {{sticker:darius-angry}}  I was mostly excited to have Warring Kingdoms Garen, I like the particles, all green , when he e's its a dragon, so nice. {{sticker:garen-swing}}  The Blitz skin was a nice touch, used to main him. Got all these skins for 2947 RP.

replies.body:
NOOOOOOOOO

I thought I had all of the dragon related skins besides Aurelion Sol's skin Q.Q How could I have dropped the ball so hard on this?

It's kinda ugly too imo _-_ Eh, I will add it to the list.

Thanks for the heads up and congrats on getting stuff you like from the My Shop, I will have to check mine when I get home.
